data.title: Robert Stevenson b.1859 scotland
data.text:
I wonder if I could ask a big favour , could someone please find a death for Robert stevenson b.c 1859 in Glasgow , I have him on the 1891 scottish census with his family , just used up all my credits and can't afford any more till next week,

Thank you

Jean

I'm sorry Aileen ,

I don't know if did re marry , I haven't found him in 1901,

Thanks for all your help, it's much appreciated.

Jean

Just seen your mention of divorce, that's unusual for those times isn't it?

Where did you find that ?

If you look at a marriage record on ScotlandsPeople you may see in red RCE

this means that there has been something added to one of the records....mostly divorces for marriage records, inquest results for deaths and paternity for births

Yes it was the son John that made me think it may well be the family and also the daughter called Sarah.

Still not sure of his death though just to many to look at. Might try to find the marriage but not tonight

Aileen,

Thank you so much for finding the marriage and deaths for Robert and his second wife Maggie, I wonder if the children Sarah and Archiebald on the 1901 census were Robert and Sarah's or Robert and Maggie's,

I will check next week on Scotland's people, Thank you once again,

best wishes

Jean

Sarah is given as 9yrs old on the 1901 census and Archibald as 6yrs. I think they would both be Sarah's children.

Do you want the details from the marriage and death certs?

Marriage for Robert and Maggie

Robert Stevenson (Cab Driver) formerly married to Sarah Newall aged 40 of 14 Mansefiels Street Partick son of Allan Stevenson (Engine Fitter) deceased and Elizabeth Stirling previously Stevenson ms McNicol deceased married Maggie Gardner (Domestic Servant) aged 30 of 4 Mount Pleasant Rothesay daughter of John (Butler) and Janet Gardner ms McNaughton both deceased on 21/06/1899 at 52 West Nile Street Glasgow

Marriage for Sarah and Charles

Charles McDonald (Ironwork Labourer) aged 38 of 51 Wallace Street Glasgow son of Neil (Mason) and Catherine McDonald ms McDonald (Deceased) married Sarah Newall (Domestic Servant) formerly wife of Robert Stevenson (Cab Driver) aged 42 of The Limes Crieff daughter of James (Cab Driver) and Jane Newall ms Hendry both deceased on 09/06/1905 at 20 Maxwell Drive Glasgow .

Death for Robert

Robert Stevenson ( Tramway Depot Yardsman) married to Maggie Gardner died 03/03/1916 2:30pm at 243 Sprinburn Road Glasgow aged 57 (Parents details as before) cause of death Carcinoma of Oesophagus 7months cert signed by Maggie Stevenson (Widow)

Death for Maggie

Margaret Stevenson widow of Robert Stevenson (Tramway Depot Yardsman) 05/08/1917 4:15pm at Royal Infirmary Glasgow usual residence 243 Springburn Road Glasgow aged 52 (Parents details as before except fathers occupation given as Plumber) cause of death Tubercle of the Lung, Pleurisy cert signed by Stella Stevenson (Step-Daughter) ??? may be Sarah was know as Stella.

I will give you details for Sarah later
